The property sits in the exclusive Quartier 8, close to the access gate and in a privileged position at the end of a low-traffic residential street, offering added privacy and minimal circulation in front of the home.The house features a contemporary design with an efficient single-level layout. Situated just a few meters away from the main road, the majority of the available lots boast spectacular ocean vistas, making it an ideal investment for those seeking a peaceful and secure retreat surrounded by nature.One of the key advantages of this development is its tranquil and exclusive setting, providing residents with a serene environment to build their dream home. With feasibility for electricity and potable water already in place, residents can enjoy modern comforts while being immersed in the beauty of their surroundings. It's worth noting that each new buyer will be responsible for installing their own septic tank for wastewater management.The lots within this project typically feature a rectangular shape, starting at 20 meters by 10 meters, totaling 200 square meters in area. For those looking for larger plots, there are options available to suit various preferences and needs.Among the amenities offered within the project is a Clubhouse currently under construction, boasting panoramic ocean views and a refreshing swimming pool within the development. Additionally, there is another Clubhouse located on the beachfront of San Diego, complete with a pool and direct access to the sandy shores.Conveniently situated approximately 30 minutes from the airport, this project is also just a short drive away from the beautiful beaches of San Diego and iconic surf spots such as Punta Roca, El Tunco, Sunzal, Atami, and El Zonte. With easy access to Sunset Park and Surf City 1, residents will have a myriad of recreational activities and leisure options at their fingertips.Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of paradise in San Diego, La Libertad, where luxury living meets natural beauty.THIS LAND HAS 352.71 M2

002284078014 - BEACH HOUSE / HOSTEL FOR SALE IN CONCHALO SURF CITY, LA LIBERTAD - A spacious property is for sale with 1, 160 m² of land (1, 659.73 v²) and 548.45 m² of construction, located in Conchalío, right in the heart of Surf City, La Libertad. The property has been used for commercial and tourism purposes and features ideal infrastructure to operate a hostel, surf house, restaurant, or family recreation center, all just minutes from the beach.The construction is organized into a block of nine rooms on the first level, each with bathrooms (378.25 m²); a main building at the center of the property (70.20 m²), which can function as a reception area, living room, or dining space and includes a large bar; and a second-level structure (98.00 m²) with three rooms and two bathrooms, offering potential for an event or meeting hall. The property also includes a swimming pool, covered well, perimeter wall, and an electric gate.The property offers interior parking for at least three vehicles, along with a ramp providing direct access from the street. Finishes include a combination of concrete and ceramic floors, plastered and painted walls, exposed brick in some areas, louvered windows with metal security bars, galaxy-type false ceilings, and fiber-cement roofing over a metal structure-materials that facilitate easy maintenance and future renovations.The land is rectangular and flat. The property faces Boulevard Santa Emilia, and on the other side borders Avenida Río Grande, ensuring excellent connectivity within the tourist circuit. It is equipped with electricity, potable water supplied by a private well, septic system, public lighting in several points, and strong mobile network coverage. The surrounding area is quiet, with a mix of residential and tourism-focused properties. The house is located near some of the region's most renowned surf beaches, including Punta Roca, El Tunco, and Zunsal.Thanks to its strategic location within Surf City, its commercial potential, and the existing infrastructure, this property presents an exceptional opportunity for investors looking to develop or enhance a tourism project on the coast of La Libertad.
